duties_responsibilities.duty: Architect, build and implement network solutions according to best practices.
Perform operational maintenance on the enterprise network.
Maintain the daily operations of all network hardware.
Monitor and analyze network performance across the organization’s LAN, WAN, and WLAN.
Test, evaluate, and recommend new and emerging technologies for consideration and adoption into the enterprise environment.
Lead the implementation of new technologies and procedures for technology systems.
Management and administration of the security and authentication network as well as the remote access network.
Evaluation and implementation of networking device upgrades and security-related updates.
Management and administration of the telecommunications network.
Provide Tier 3 support for escalated service desk tickets following established protocols and mentorship to Network Engineer I/II.

education_certification.credential: Professional level certification in Cisco Networking or 5+ years of experience in a related Network Engineer position.
